Parameter.Description: Choose the data table on which you want to apply this action
Name of the column for which you want identify and handel outliers
Please mention the minimum threshold which will be used in identifying the outliers, i.e. if any value is less than the minimum threshold, it will be  identified as outlier
Please mention the maximum threshold which will be used in identifying the outliers, i.e. if any value is greater than the maximum threshold, it will be  identified as outlier
Please chose the method for handling outliers, clip means replace outliers with threshold values, remove means drop the outliers from the data,invalidate means replace the outliers with null
